Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Dish
Description: Dish mass produced by the dozen. The base is flat but pronounced, the body flared and the lip rounded and in continuation of the body wall. The clay is fine, common and buff-coloured and has been polished. See L 169, 171, 172 and 173.
